nodes.text: Argos was a male Human Sith Lord who served the reconstituted Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY, Argos was killed by the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython in the Saxan Chemical Refinery.

A Human male with pale skin, orange eyes, and gray-brown hair cut close in a striped pattern, Argos had achieved the rank of Sith Lord in the resurgent Empire by the year 3640 BBY. Argos was proficient in the use of Force blasts and lightning in conjunction with his red-bladed lightsaber, and he wore a respirator mask and armored robes in combat.

As the Galactic War broke out with the Galactic Republic, Argos was sent to the planet Corellia under the Sith Emperor's servant, the corrupted Jedi Master Tol Braga. There, as the Battle of Corellia raged across the world, Argos and several Sith Masters were sent to the Saxan Chemical Refinery accompanied by over a dozen Sith assassins and warriors in order to create a chemical bomb that would kill millions. However, the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython attacked the refinery in order to stop the Sith, and Argos was killed by the Knight during the battle.

Argos first appeared as an Elite NPC enemy during the Jedi Knight class mission "Death Cloud" on Corellia, in the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing video game Star Wars: The Old Republic developed by BioWare and LucasArts.
